name: FoodCollector
setup: Several agents in an arena with green (good) and red (bad) spheres; agents can move and shoot a ray to collect spheres.
goal: Collect as many green spheres as possible while avoiding red ones.

agents.description: Five agents sharing the same policy and acting in the same arena.

terms: +1.0 when the agent collects a green sphere.
-1.0 when the agent hits a red sphere.

behavior_parameters.vector_observation_space: Velocity, frozen/shooting state, plus grid-based perception of nearby objects.
behavior_parameters.actions: 3 continuous actions for movement and rotation plus 1 discrete action for firing the ray.
behavior_parameters.visual_observations: Optional first-person camera in the visual variant.

float_properties.name: laser_length
float_properties.description: Length of the ray used to collect spheres.
